description:
Manifest Your Desires is an Eight Module Course that is designed through video discussion and embodied practices through worksheets and action steps to create a way of being for you that is aligned with what you desire to create in your life. You will gain knowledge about yourself through inquiry and meditation, tools to shift thoughts and actions to a place of serving you and working with the 7 Laws of the Universe and a method of working that will enhance all areas of your life and allow you to really begin revealing the results you have always wanted.

It is encouraged that you take your time to work through this course as it is designed in a way that will allow you to practice each tool. Plan to take a week to complete each module, completing the course in 8 weeks. Throughout each week you will be provided with action based work to bring into your daily life.

You are capable of anything and now is your time to begin your true realization of this. Step into your potential. Live completely and unreasonably. This is your life; Settle for nothing short of amazing!!
title: Manifest Your Desires
